name: Amila Aponso
bio: Malmeege Amila Aponso, or Amila Aponso (born 23 June 1993) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer, who played for the Sri Lanka cricket team. He played first-class cricket for Ragama Cricket Club. He is a past pupil of St. Sebastians College, Moratuwa.[1] In June 2021, Aponso moved to the United States to play in the Minor League Cricket tournament.[2]
